title: Silaes Tairn
text: The Silaes Tairn are a sect of the [[Tairnadal]] elves who dwell in [[North Aerenal]] and are determined to mobilize and return to [[Xen'drik]] to reclaim the true ancestral home of the [[elves|elf]]. They are seen by the [[Valaes Tairn]] and the [[Aereni]] as extremists, since Xen'drik is now a cursed ruin, and the modern-day [[giant]]s and [[drow]] are a far cry from the ancient foes of the [[Age of Giants]].
